title: Fight for Glory: 2024 World Series
overview: Building on over 80 years of MLB chronicling the World Series, Fight for Glory: 2024 World Series takes fans deeper than ever before, offering a cinematic, all-access experience. Through exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, raw emotion, and high-stakes drama, the series expands the perspective on baseball's biggest stage, bringing audiences closer than ever to America's favorite pastime and the relentless pursuit of its ultimate prize. With unprecedented access to stars like Freddie Freeman, Mookie Betts, and Aaron Judge, the series captures the intensity of the game from the dugout to the clubhouse, offering a rare, unfiltered look at what it takes to compete at the highest level.
